name: open-in-npp
description: Open the active file in Notepad++

openInNpp.Executable.markdownDescription: Specifies the path of the _Notepad++_ executable; in case the empty default is not overwritten the path is provisioned as explained [here](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=CSeitel.open-in-npp#extension-settings)

openInNpp.spawnOptions.markdownDescription: Expert mode: Specifies additional options for child process creation; details are available [here](https://nodejs.org/api/child_process.html#child_process_child_process_spawn_command_args_options)

openInNpp.workingDirectory.markdownDescription: Specifies the path of the folder used as [working directory](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Working_directory) during the execution of _Notepad++_; in case the empty default is not overwritten the working directory is enforced as explained [here](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=CSeitel.open-in-npp#extension-settings)

openInNpp.decoupledExecution.markdownDescription: Run _Notepad++_ independently of _VS-Code_, in particular, do not close _Notepad++_ upon exit of _VS-Code_; corresponds to option [detached](https://nodejs.org/api/child_process.html#child_process_options_detached) of child process creation

openInNpp.commandLineArguments.markdownDescription: Specifies additional arguments to be passed along to _Notepad++_; a comprehensive overview of the command line parameters of _Notepad++_ is available [here](https://npp-user-manual.org/docs/command-prompt/)

openInNpp.multiInst.markdownDescription: Open a separate [instance](https://npp-user-manual.org/docs/preferences/#multi-instance) of _Notepad++_ for each command execution; corresponds to command line parameter [-multiInst](https://npp-user-manual.org/docs/command-prompt/)

openInNpp.skipSessionHandling.markdownDescription: Prevent _Notepad++_ from loading the [previous session](https://npp-user-manual.org/docs/preferences/#backup) and changing its state; corresponds to command line parameter [-nosession](https://npp-user-manual.org/docs/command-prompt/)

openInNpp.openFolderAsWorkspace.markdownDescription: When passing a folder path along to _Notepad++_ let this folder be handled as a _workspace_; corresponds to command line parameter [-openFoldersAsWorkspace](https://npp-user-manual.org/docs/command-prompt/)

openInNpp.filesInFolderPattern.markdownDescription: Instead of passing a folder path along to _Notepad++_ find all files (relative to this folder) matching the specified [glob pattern](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/references/vscode-api#GlobPattern) and let the result list become the arguments of the execution of _Notepad++_ [more 🛈](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=CSeitel.open-in-npp#extension-settings)

openInNpp.matchingFilesLimit.markdownDescription: When the setting _files-In-Folder-Pattern_ is applied and more files than the specified number are found a dialog box will provide [options](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=CSeitel.open-in-npp)

openInNpp.preserveCursorPosition.markdownDescription: Let _Notepad++_ preserve the cursor position of the _VS-Code_ editor; corresponds to command line parameters [-n / -c](https://npp-user-manual.org/docs/command-prompt/)

openInNpp.extendExplorerContextMenu.markdownDescription: Add _Open in Notepad++_ to the context menu of the _VS-Code_ explorer

openInNpp.extendEditorContextMenu.markdownDescription: Add _Open in Notepad++_ to the context menu of the _VS-Code_ editor

openInNpp.extendEditorTitleMenu.markdownDescription: Add _Open in Notepad++_ to the title menu of the _VS-Code_ editor
